definition: to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary

sentences.english: Taking time out from their heartbreak, they get back to nature.
sentences.chinese: 逐步从心碎的爱情中走出来后，他们复归自然。

sentences.english: Of course there are thousands more stories of heartbreak.
sentences.chinese: 当然还有成千上万令人心碎的故事。

sentences.english: He strums his guitar and sings, his voice so sweet that it's heartbreaking.
sentences.chinese: 他漫不经心地边弹边唱，声音如此甜美，令人心碎。

sentences.english: I was vexed and sorrowful and had no idea how to retrieve.
sentences.chinese: 我愤怒，心碎，不知道如何撑过去。

sentences.english: A heart-broken loss, get Rafer out the town, everybody hates you.
sentences.chinese: 一场心碎的失利，斯通滚出休城，每个人都讨厌你。

sentences.english: It's been a heartbreakingly tragic two months for coal.
sentences.chinese: 这是令人心碎的两个月，有关煤碳悲剧的两个月。

sentences.english: Heartbreaks last as long as you want and cut as deep as you allow them to go.
sentences.chinese: 心碎的时间和伤害的深度，完全取于你自已。

sentences.english: In the days that followed, Lightning seemed heart-broken.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的日子里，闪电像心碎了一样。

sentences.english: You will also face heartbreak  and abandonmen t by those youlove.
sentences.chinese: 你同样会面临心碎时刻以及你深爱的人的抛弃。

sentences.english: Spend time with friends, and share your grief and heartbreak.
sentences.chinese: 多与朋友交流来分担你的悲伤和心碎。

sentences.english: You aren't my heart heart heart heart heartbreaker.
sentences.chinese: 你们绝对不会是让我心碎的人。

sentences.english: SaiLin heartbreak in bar drink, dance, vent.
sentences.chinese: 赛琳心碎地在酒吧喝酒，跳舞，发泄。

sentences.english: Borrowing from his work in actuarial science and insurance and his knowledge of the broken-heart syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 借助于他在精算学和保险学以及对心碎症状的知识。

sentences.english: Sheldon: Come on. Who hasn't seen this differential below "here I sit, broken-hearted"?
sentences.chinese: 拜托。这微分谁没见过啊？我真是心碎。

sentences.english: To do so would be to allow the promise-breaker to keep on breaking your heart.
sentences.chinese: 这么做将会让承诺打破者不停地另你心碎。

sentences.english: The quality of life and livability of these areas is really heartbreaking.
sentences.chinese: 这些地方的生活质量和宜居性确实令人心碎。

definition: to feel distressed about sth/heartache/cardiac pain
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
lit. liver and guts cut to pieces (idiom)/fig. grief-stricken
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
to be so in pain as to not want to live/to be so grieved as to wish one were dead
to love dearly/to feel sorry for sb/to regret/to grudge/to be distressed
